trans-unit.source: Provides enumeration support for the local values of any dependency properties that exist on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 上存在的任何依赖属性的本地值提供枚举支持。

trans-unit.source: A *local value* is a value for a dependency property that was set directly on a dependency property, by calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>, or more typically by using the set accessor of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] property wrapper that calls <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> internally.
trans-unit.target: A*本地值*是直接对依赖项属性，通过调用设置依赖项属性的值<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>，或通过使用 set 访问器的更常见的做法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]属性包装器调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>内部。

trans-unit.source: Examples of other property system determinants that are not local values are values set through styles, or dependency property default values.
trans-unit.target: 其他不是本地值的属性系统行列式的示例包括通过样式，设置值或依赖项属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A> method and implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>返回<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>方法，并实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>接口。

trans-unit.source: A public <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator> constructor does not exist; therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A> to obtain an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 公共<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>构造函数不存在; 因此，你必须调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>若要获取此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Do not modify local values (by calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>) while enumerating local values.
trans-unit.target: 请不要修改本地值 (通过调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>) 枚举本地值时。

trans-unit.source: If you change or clear the property values based on properties that are returned by the enumerator, the change or clear operations do not invalidate the enumerator collection, as is the case for many <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> implementations.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改或清除的属性值基于枚举器返回的属性，更改或清除操作不会使失效枚举器集合中，对于许多人来说都是如此<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>实现。

trans-unit.source: Also, the enumerator view is a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: 此外，枚举器视图是一个快照。

trans-unit.source: A change to the collection is not guaranteed to be thread safe, and no lock is enforced.
trans-unit.target: 对集合进行更改不保证是线程安全的并强制实施未锁定。

trans-unit.source: Other threads still have free access to the local values from a context other than the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 其他线程仍可以免费访问的本地值从枚举器之外的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Use this type if you have operations in your class where it is important to know whether a property's value came from a local value.
trans-unit.target: 如果，使用此类型类中具有操作其中务必知道属性的值是否来自本地值。

trans-unit.source: For example, use this type in an <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A> implementation, or where you want to query the metadata on all locally set properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用此类型的<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A>实现，或你想要查询对所有的元数据本地设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items that are represented in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取在集合中表示的项数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中项的数目。

trans-unit.source: This property is not a defined member of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> but is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是定义的成员的<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>但为方便起见提供。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: This generally accessible version of the property relies on a snapshot of the collection that is taken at creation.
trans-unit.target: 此版本通常可访问的属性依赖于的集合在创建时拍摄的快照。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the provided <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> is equivalent to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> 是否等效于此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see langword="true" /> 等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports reference equality only.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持引用相等性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将枚举数推进到集合的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <see langword="false" /> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果枚举数已成功地推进到下一个元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果枚举数传递到集合的末尾，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> objects are the same.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> 对象是否相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="obj1" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> is equal to the <paramref name="obj2" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj1" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> 等于 <paramref name="obj2" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports reference equality only.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持引用相等性。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> objects to determine whether they are not the same.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> 对象，以确定它们是否不相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports reference equality only.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持引用相等性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将枚举数设置为其初始位置，该位置位于集合中第一个元素之前。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this members, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current" />。

trans-unit.source: The current element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> 接口时使用。
